alert.note: Alert for Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 1:27PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 200 PM MST... At 127 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Estrella, or 18 miles east of Gila Bend. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Estrella, Sonoran National Monument, Freeman, Big Horn and Mobile. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 131 and 142. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 13 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
